coreInvention: Combines Eflornithine Hydrochloride with herbal phytochemicals like Curcumin, EGCG, and Apigenin. Synergistically inhibits 5a-reductase and ODC enzymes for stronger, more permanent hair reduction effects.

ingredients.name: Eflornithine Hydrochloride
ingredients.description: Inhibits the Ornithine Decarboxylase (ODC) enzyme, slowing cell division in follicles.

ingredients.name: Curcumin & Apigenin
ingredients.description: Herbal compounds that provide anti-inflammatory effects and inhibit androgen receptors.

coreInvention: A novel depilatory compound created by conjugating Interferon IFNγ with an antibody that targets hair follicle stem cells or hair bulbs. This targeted delivery breaks the follicle's immune tolerance, leading to immune-mediated hair removal.

ingredients.name: Interferon IFNγ-Antibody Conjugate
ingredients.description: Targets hair follicles and induces an immune response to achieve temporary or permanent depilation.

coreInvention: A skin cosmetic composition featuring marquain, a compound found in extracts like Sophora Flavescens (Kujin). It inhibits the testosterone 5α-reductase enzyme, effectively suppressing the hormonal trigger for hair growth.

ingredients.name: Marquain
ingredients.description: Inhibits the testosterone 5α-reductase enzyme to reduce hair growth promotion.

coreInvention: An herbal depilatory gel peel-off mask formulated with papain and bromelain as key ingredients. These proteolytic enzymes break down hair proteins and weaken the follicle for gentle, effective hair removal.

ingredients.name: Papain
ingredients.description: A proteolytic enzyme from papaya that disintegrates the hair cuticle.

ingredients.name: Bromelain
ingredients.description: An enzyme from pineapple that acts as a natural exfoliant and helps soften hair.

coreInvention: An extract from Eurya japonica exerts an anti-proliferative and cytotoxic effect on dermal papilla cells, starving the follicle of nutrients needed for growth.

ingredients.name: Eurya Japonica Extract
ingredients.description: Natural plant extract that has cytotoxic effects on dermal papilla cells.

coreInvention: Features Mallotus Japonicus extract for hair inhibition. Suppresses dermal papilla cells. Reduces alkaline phosphatase (ALP) activity. Safe and effective for cosmetic and medicinal applications.

ingredients.name: Mallotus Japonicus Extract
ingredients.description: Suppresses dermal papilla cell development to inhibit hair growth.

coreInvention: Application of 6-gingerol to promote aging of hair follicle mastoid cells. It inhibits mitochondrial autophagy by regulating LncRNA H19 in exosomes, leading to reduced hair follicle cell proliferation and inhibited hair growth.

ingredients.name: 6-Gingerol
ingredients.description: Promotes aging and apoptosis in hair follicle cells by modulating miRNA pathways.

coreInvention: Multi-functional composition for underarm care. Retards hair growth, brightens skin, controls odor. Combines hair growth retardants with exfoliating acids (AHA/BHA/PHA). 3-in-1 solution.

ingredients.name: Gymnemic Acid, Larrea Divaricata Extract
ingredients.description: Natural extracts that act as hair growth retardants.

ingredients.name: AHA/BHA/PHA
ingredients.description: Exfoliate skin, prevent ingrown hairs, and inhibit odor-causing bacteria.

coreInvention: Herbal gel for permanent facial hair removal. Uses a natural blend including Poonadharam, Papaya, Aloe, and Turmeric. The formulation inhibits future hair growth while soothing the skin, offering a painless and non-irritating alternative to conventional methods.

ingredients.name: Poonadharam & Papain
ingredients.description: Acts as a natural hair remover by affecting hair follicles and slowing down regrowth.

ingredients.name: Aloe Vera & Turmeric
ingredients.description: Provide anti-inflammatory and soothing properties to the skin after hair removal.

coreInvention: Modulates hair follicle growth and damage via the NF-kB signaling pathway. An NF-kB activity or expression promoter is used as the active ingredient in a pharmaceutical or cosmetic composition for depilatory purposes.

ingredients.name: NF-kB Promoter
ingredients.description: Activates the NF-kB pathway, which can lead to hair follicle damage and hair removal.

coreInvention: Treats inflammatory skin conditions like PFB, AKN, and HS by inhibiting hair growth. Uses FP receptor antagonists or ornithine decarboxylase inhibitors to reduce hair diameter and growth, alleviating the conditions.

ingredients.name: FP Receptor Antagonists
ingredients.description: Block prostaglandin signals to inhibit hair growth and reduce inflammation.

ingredients.name: Eflornithine Hydrochloride
ingredients.description: Inhibits the ODC enzyme to slow hair growth and reduce follicle-related inflammation.

coreInvention: Utilizes Ornithine decarboxylase inhibitors (like eflornithine) to arrest the anagen phase, making follicles less susceptible to damage from chemotherapy or radiation.

ingredients.name: ODC Inhibitors (Eflornithine)
ingredients.description: Arrests the anagen (growth) phase of the hair cycle.

coreInvention: A composition containing synthetic peptides designed to enhance or repair the skin barrier. While primarily for anti-aging, the peptides also have properties that can be used to inhibit or delay hair growth.

ingredients.name: Synthetic Peptides
ingredients.description: Peptide sequences such as Palm-Gly-Nle-Lys-Leu-Tyr-NH2 that modulate cell activity to delay hair growth.

coreInvention: A heterocyclic compound that acts as a 15-PGDH inhibitor. By inhibiting the 15-hydroxyprostaglandin dehydrogenase enzyme, it increases local prostaglandin levels, which can be used to modulate biological processes, including hair growth.

ingredients.name: 15-PGDH Inhibitor
ingredients.description: Inhibits the enzyme that degrades prostaglandins, thereby influencing the hair growth cycle.

coreInvention: A natural ingredient mixture that reduces hair growth on the human body. The core of the invention is a blend of walnut leaf, orange peel, and lemon peel extracts, which provide both hair removal and skin care benefits.

ingredients.name: Walnut, Orange, & Lemon Extracts
ingredients.description: Work synergistically to reduce hair and care for the skin.

ingredients.name: Turmeric Powder
ingredients.description: Provides additional skin care benefits.

coreInvention: A composition of core-shell nano-elements for skin delivery. The core comprises a collagen-synthesis stimulating compound (CSSC) and is surrounded by a fatty amine shell. This system can be used to deliver active agents for various effects, including inhibiting hair growth.

ingredients.name: Surface Modified Nano-Particles
ingredients.description: Encapsulate and deliver active ingredients (like CSSCs) deep into the skin to modulate hair growth.

coreInvention: A synergistic blend of traditional Chinese medicine extracts, salicylic acid, and a red wine base work together to inhibit hair growth through combined phytochemical and keratolytic effects.

ingredients.name: TCM Extracts & Wine Base
ingredients.description: Provides a base of phytochemicals to inhibit hair growth signals.

ingredients.name: Salicylic Acid
ingredients.description: A beta-hydroxy acid that provides keratolytic (exfoliating) effects.

coreInvention: Dermatological preparation to prevent hair regrowth. Combines menthol and a local anesthetic (e.g., Lidocaine). Creates a synergistic cooling and numbing effect to weaken hair roots.

ingredients.name: Menthol
ingredients.description: Provides a cooling effect that weakens the hair root.

ingredients.name: Local Anesthetics
ingredients.description: Work in synergy with menthol to numb the area and further inhibit hair root function.

coreInvention: Topical cream with eflornithine hydrochloride. Enhanced with lavender oil as a penetration enhancer. Improves drug delivery to the hair follicle. More potent inhibition of ornithine decarboxylase (ODC) for better hair reduction.

ingredients.name: Eflornithine Hydrochloride
ingredients.description: An irreversible inhibitor of ornithine decarboxylase (ODC), which slows down hair regrowth.

ingredients.name: Lavender Oil
ingredients.description: Acts as a penetration enhancer, helping the active ingredient to reach the hair follicle more effectively.

coreInvention: Inhibits hair growth via FP receptor antagonists. Blocks Prostaglandin F receptors to slow or stop hair growth. Treats hirsutism & hypertrichosis. Also helps prevent chemo/radiation-induced hair loss.

ingredients.name: FP Receptor Antagonists
ingredients.description: Compounds that block the prostaglandin F receptor to inhibit hair growth signals.

coreInvention: Uses endogenous small RNA miR-24 to regulate hair growth. Promoting or agonizing miR-24 inhibits hair growth, while inhibiting it promotes growth. Offers a new molecular target for hair modulation.

ingredients.name: miR-24 Agonists/Promoters
ingredients.description: Upregulating miR-24 expression inhibits skin and hair regeneration, providing a method for hair growth reduction.

coreInvention: Regulates hair growth by modulating the TRPM5 ion channel. Antagonists like triphenylphosphine oxide (TPPO) inhibit hair growth by promoting catagen. A novel mechanism for hair cycle control.

ingredients.name: Triphenylphosphine Oxide (TPPO)
ingredients.description: An antagonist of the TRPM5 ion channel that promotes the regression phase of the hair cycle.

ingredients.name: siRNA targeting TRPM5
ingredients.description: Reduces cell proliferation in the hair matrix, leading to hair growth inhibition.

coreInvention: A depilatory agent using an alkaline denaturant (like urea) to destroy the DNA of hair mother cells. The denaturant separates the DNA's double helix, halting cell replication. Liposomes are used for targeted delivery.

ingredients.name: Alkaline Denaturant (e.g., Urea)
ingredients.description: Separates DNA strands in hair mother cells, preventing replication and growth.

coreInvention: Modulates hair growth via the taste receptor TAS2R4 in follicles. Agonists like Stevioside & Rebaudioside A inhibit hair growth by activating the receptor and promoting the catagen (resting) phase.

ingredients.name: Rebaudioside A, Stevioside
ingredients.description: Activate TAS2R4, pushing follicles into the resting stage to inhibit growth.

ingredients.name: L-Tryptophan
ingredients.description: Also promotes the catagen stage and reduces hair matrix keratinocyte proliferation.

coreInvention: Uses capryloyl glycine in topical compositions for hirsutism. Inhibits unwanted hair growth, particularly on the face. Likely works by inhibiting the ornithine decarboxylase enzyme.

ingredients.name: Capryloyl Glycine
ingredients.description: A lipoaminoacid that inhibits hair growth, likely by inhibiting the ornithine decarboxylase enzyme.

coreInvention: Employs Prostaglandin F2α (PGF2α) analogs as FP receptor antagonists. Blocks the receptor to inhibit hair growth signals. Treats hirsutism and prevents regrowth. Also applicable for chemo-related hair loss.

ingredients.name: PGF2α Analogs
ingredients.description: Act as FP receptor antagonists, blocking signals that promote hair growth.

coreInvention: Reduces hair growth with cold receptor agonists (TRPM8/TRPA1). Compounds like menthol and eugenol create a "cooling" sensation that inhibits follicle activity. Can be combined with other hair removal methods.

ingredients.name: Menthol and Menthyl Lactate
ingredients.description: Cyclic terpenes that act as TRPM8 agonists, creating a cooling effect that inhibits hair growth.

ingredients.name: Icilin and Eugenol
ingredients.description: Agonists that activate both TRPM8 and TRPA1 receptors to reduce hair growth.

coreInvention: A 2-in-1 composition for underarm use. Combines hair inhibitor α-difluoromethylornithine (DFMO) with an antiperspirant/deodorant. Reduces hair growth while controlling sweat and odor in a single product.

ingredients.name: α-Difluoromethylornithine (DFMO)
ingredients.description: An ornithine decarboxylase inhibitor that reduces the rate of hair growth.

ingredients.name: Antiperspirant Salts & Deodorant Actives
ingredients.description: Control perspiration and inhibit odor-causing bacteria.
